Home » 39P6 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 1 Hetuduka, Duka
1.17 Hetuduka, āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Hetuduka, Duka
Hetuduka, āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
40.
115Hetuṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
116Hetuyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
41.
117Hetuṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
118Hetuyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
